title: Depression Analysis from Social Media Text
description: Built an NLP-based emotion detection model on 40,000+ social media entries. Used tokenization, stemming, and lemmatization in a Python pipeline for scalable preprocessing and iterative model training.

title: E-Learning Platform
description: Developed a full-stack e-learning platform with user auth and course enrollment. Migrated from Django to MERN stack, boosting engagement by 35% and simplifying backend workflows by 80%.

title: BCI-Based Stress Detection System
description: Analyzed EEG data from 40 participants using FFT and statistical feature extraction. Applied PCA and k-NN, achieving 96% accuracy with XGBoost. Built a web prototype for real-time stress prediction.
